intro: Crepidifolium tenuifolium, commonly known as the slender-leaf crepidifolium, is a member of the Araliaceae family. It is a herbaceous plant characterized by its finely divided, feathery leaves that give it a delicate appearance. Native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia, it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in umbels. Its unique foliage and adaptability make it a popular choice for indoor gardening and tropical plant collections.
